text: Ka Kamoe janji ngon cot Israil Rasul bak jih le meukirem bagah â€˜Oh teuka rasul bak jih nyan meuhat Geujak peuingat bek pubuet salah Bek jipeuturot napsu jeuheut that Jikheun le ligat sulet sileupah Nyang ladom rasul jikheun sulet that Nyang ladom meuhat jipoh tan salah Dum jipoh mate nyang ladom meuhat
